page.title: 14Trade _ Foodmarket
page.content: The foodmarket was built in December 1973,The land was previously beloning to Mr H.Colton and was leased by Mr A. Pacey as a stack yard for his farm. During the eleven years the shop has been built there have been two owners',of which the present owners' have been there for five years.As well as the proprietor,three part _ time staff are employed to serve customers from Swinderby and the surrounding villages.Apart from general groceries, the shop retails wool,hardware,fancy goods and wines and spirits.A new innovation _ started about a year ago_ is home baking and this has proved very popular with regular orders every week.The latest "new line"is filled rolls. Approxamatly 150 per week are being sold at the present time.Staff have also catered for weddings and a funeral.
